this file is to experiment about physics.
to use this python file, you should know this key.

1. key f
the key 'f' is to regulate the friction force.

2. key c
the key 'c' is to measure the time that ball is falling.

3. key s
the key 's' is to start or restart the experiment.

and you can regulate the angle by dragging the ball at the left and up in the screen.
if you drag, number under the ball will vary.

Please take this manual, so you should enjoy this file.
